summary:
CONTEXTUREARCHITECTS is an international operating Dutch design firm, based in Amsterdam (NL), Qingdao and Chengdu (CN) and is being led by Wouter Bolsius and Onno van Welzen. 
Context and Texture stand for the two extreme approaches of architecture and cover the whole spectrum of the design process. Our HQ is in Amsterdam, while we have a branch office in Qingdao (east CN) and a representative office in Chengdu (west CN).
CONTEXTUREARCHITECTS has experience with designing and building in Europe and China for twenty-five years, in which they have realized many carefully designed projects. 
CONTEXTUREARCHITECTS designs houses, schools, care complexes, commercial, offices, utility projects and on all scales and levels from urban plan to architecture to interior design. 
Key projects are Hofeiland and Oosterbaken in Hoogvliet, Rotterdam (Netherlands) and Donglilake in Tianjin, Dream Town Qingdao (China) and Xishan Villa Dalian (China). Many projects have been designed for China Vanke, the world's largest housing developer.
